mapper.select: select * from tbl_boards order by board_no

select r.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from tbl_boards b where
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
writer like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' or writer like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
order by b.board_no desc) a
where rownum <= (#{page} * 5) or #{page} = 0)r
where r.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5

select count(1) from tbl_boards where
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
writer like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' or writer like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_boards (board_no, title, content, writer, img) values (boards_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{img})
mapper.update: update tbl_boards set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
